title: Christopher Stanley
text:
Christopher Stanley (born December 1965) is an American film and television actor. He appeared in the <a href="Ben%20Affleck">Ben Affleck</a>-directed film "<a href="Argo%20%282012%20film%29">Argo</a>" and in "<a href="Zero%20Dark%20Thirty">Zero Dark Thirty</a>". 
His most notable TV role was as politician <a href="List%20of%20Mad%20Men%20characters%23Henry%20Francis">Henry Francis</a>, the second husband of <a href="Betty%20Draper">Betty Francis</a> (<a href="January%20Jones">January Jones</a>) on "<a href="Mad%20Men">Mad Men</a>". Stanley's role on "<a href="Mad%20Men">Mad Men</a>" was recurring in the third and fourth seasons and a main cast member from the fifth season forward.
